an5.137:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, appam rattiya supanti, bahum jagganti.
an5.137:1.3: Itthi, bhikkhave, purisadhippaya appam rattiya supati, bahum jaggati.
an5.137:1.4: Puriso, bhikkhave, itthadhippayo appam rattiya supati, bahum jaggati.
an5.137:1.5: Coro, bhikkhave, adanadhippayo appam rattiya supati, bahum jaggati.
an5.137:1.6: Raja, bhikkhave, rajakaraniyesu yutto appam rattiya supati, bahum jaggati.
an5.137:1.7: Bhikkhu, bhikkhave, visamyogadhippayo appam rattiya supati, bahum jaggati.
an5.137:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca appam rattiya supanti, bahum jagganti”ti.
